 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לִיץ‎</span>] **verb** ==scorn== (Late Hebrew ***id.***; verb not in cognates; compare Phoenician <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מלץ‎</span> ***interpreter*** [[BDB#CIS|CIS]]<sup>22</sup>; [[BDB#CIS|CIS]]<sup>44</sup>; [[BDB#CIS|CIS]]<sup>88</sup>; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> is ***turn aside*** (intransitive); hence perhaps properly ***speak indirectly*** or ***obliquely***, [[BDB#Fl|Fl]]<sup>De Pr.1, 6</sup>); — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** 3 masculine <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לַצְתָּ‎</span> [[Prov.9.12|Prov 9:12]] ***Imperfect*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יָלִיץ‎</span> [[Prov.3.34|Prov 3:34]] + 2 t.; ***Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לֵץ‎</span> [[Prov.9.7|Prov 9:7]] + 11 t.; plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לֵצִים‎</span> [[Ps.1.1|Ps 1:1]] + 3 t.; — ***scorn***, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְלַצְתָּ לְבַדְּךָ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תִשָּׂא‎</span> [[Prov.9.12|Prov 9:12]] ***if thou scornest thou alone shalt bear it*** (opposed to <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חָכַמְתָּ‎</span>), with accusative [[Prov.14.9|Prov 14:9]]; [[Prov.19.28|Prov 19:28]] with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְ‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לַלֵּצִים‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הוּאיָֿלִיץ‎</span> ***scorners he*** (***God***) ***scorneth*** [[Prov.3.34|Prov 3:34]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַלֵּץ‎</span> the scorner is proud and haughty [[Prov.21.24|Prov 21:24]], delights in scorning [[Prov.1.22|Prov 1:22]], is incapable of discipline [[Prov.9.7|Prov 9:7]], reproof [[Prov.9.8|Prov 9:8]] is [[Prov.15.12|Prov 15:12]], or rebuke is [[Prov.13.1|Prov 13:1]], cannot find wisdom [[Prov.14.6|Prov 14:6]] is an abomination [[Prov.24.9|Prov 24:9]], should be avoided [[Ps.1.1|Ps 1:1]] smitten and punished for the benefit of the simple [[Prov.19.25|Prov 19:25]]; [[Prov.21.11|Prov 21:11]] and banished for the removal of contention [[Prov.22.10|Prov 22:10]] judgment is prepared for him [[Prov.19.29|Prov 19:29]] \|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עָרִיץ‎</span> [[Isa.29.20|Isa 29:20]] wine is a scorner [[Prov.20.1|Prov 20:1]]. — 

**Hiph\`il** ***Perfect*** 3 masculine plural suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הֱלִיצֻנִי‎</span> [[Ps.119.51|Ps 119:51]] ***Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מֵלִיץ‎</span> [[Gen.42.23|Gen 42:23]]; [[Job.33.23|Job 33:23]] plural construct <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְלִיצֵי‎</span> [[2Chr.32.31|2Chr 32:31]] suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְלִיצַי‎</span> [[Job.16.20|Job 16:20]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְלִיצֶיךָ‎</span> [[Isa.43.27|Isa 43:27]] — 

**1.** ***deride*** [[Job.16.20|Job 16:20]]; [[Ps.119.51|Ps 119:51]]. 

**2.** Participle ***interpreter*** [[Gen.42.23|Gen 42:23]] ([[BDB#E|E]]); figurative of intermediaries between God and man, [[Job.33.28|Job 33:28]]; [[Isa.43.27|Isa 43:27]] ***ambassador*** [[2Chr.32.31|2Chr 32:31]]. **Po\`lel** ***Participle*** plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לֹצֲצִים‎</span> (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְ‎</span> dropped [[BDB#Kö|Kö]]<sup>ii. 479</sup>) ***scorners*** [[Hos.7.5|Hos 7:5]]. **Hithpa\`el** ***Imperfect*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תִּתְלוֺצָ֑צוּ‎</span> ***act as a scorner, shew oneself a mocker***, [[Isa.28.22|Isa 28:22]].
